tables.description: Contains daily sales records with product details

columns.name: transaction_id
columns.instructions: Use for exact record lookup. Never include in aggregations.

columns.name: sale_date
columns.description: Date of transaction in YYYY-MM-DD format
columns.instructions: Always filter by this column for time-based queries. Use DATE_TRUNC for grouping.
columns.query_example: SELECT DATE_TRUNC('month', sale_date) AS month, SUM(amount) FROM sales_transactions GROUP BY 1

columns.name: product_category
columns.instructions: Use for filtering or grouping. Valid values: Electronics, Apparel, Home Goods
columns.query_example: SELECT product_category, AVG(unit_price) FROM sales_transactions GROUP BY product_category

common_operations: Use CTAS (CREATE TABLE AS) for large aggregations
Partition queries by sale_date for better performance
